articles.description: At 25, Mariah Bell has one of Team USA's most compelling stories. Nathan Chen is a favorites for gold and ice dancers bring depth to Beijing.
articles.content:
NASHVILLE, Tenn. — After four days of impressive quads, memorable performances and, unfortunately, a few positive COVID-19 tests, the 2022 U.S. Figure Skating Championships are in the books.
Some of… [+4928 chars]

articles.author: Marcel Louis-Jacques
articles.title: Miami Dolphins WR Jaylen Waddle sets record for most receptions by rookie - ESPN India
articles.description: Jaylen Waddle reeled in his 102nd catch of the season on Sunday, breaking Anquan Boldin's record for most receptions by a rookie.
articles.content: MIAMI -- Dolphins wide receiver Jaylen Waddle set an NFL rookie record for receptions in a single season in Sunday's 33-24 win against the New England Patriots, reeling in his 102nd catch on the four… [+1275 chars]
